scripts.build:flowcharts: mkdirp flowcharts && for f in recipes/*.json ; do node recipe_to_flowchart.js "$f" "./flowcharts/$(basename "${f%%.*}").json"; done;
scripts.build: mkdirp dist && browserify src/index.ts -g browserify-css -p tsify --outfile dist/index.js -dv
scripts.watch: mkdirp dist && watchify src/index.ts -g browserify-css -p tsify --outfile dist/index.js -dv
